Entries.abigail_videogames: Urghh... I still can't beat the first level of 'Journey of the Prairie King'!$u
Entries.haley_photo: %{{HaleyName}}{{HaleyPossession}} too involved with {{HaleyPronounLC2}} camera to notice you.
Entries.harvey_examine_left: Now just hold still... Take a deep breath for me.$u
Entries.demetrius_read: We're insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley. Maybe that's a good thing.
Entries.robin_exercise: My arms are strong... *pant*... but my legs need work... *gasp*
Entries.caroline_exercise: Don't look! I'm all red and sweaty.$s
Entries.shane_work: %{{ShaneName}}{{ShanePossession}} hard at work. {{ShaneGenderUC}} doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.marnie_exercise: %{{MarnieName}} smiles at you through a mist of sweat.
Entries.jodi_exercise: Ungh... Breathe in.... Ungh.... Breathe out.$4
Entries.vincent_read_right: {{PennyMarital}} {{PennyName}} says I have to read this book before I can go play.$s
Entries.penny_wave_left: This town's safe, but I always walk the children home anyway.
Entries.sam_gameboy: One sec... I gotta beat this level.$7
Entries.sam_pool: $c .5#Hmm... If I give the cue ball a bit of a top spin, maybe I could...$7#$e#*Sigh*... I'm not very good.$s
Entries.sam_work: %{{SamName}}{{SamPossession}} on the clock... better not get {{SamPronounLC2}} in trouble.
